channel.title: Trollbox Whisper
channel.description: With all the anti-WKM proposals why not consider giving Fool and Scorned the ability to trollbox whispers? They have room for another day ability and it could indirectly counter WKM by reducing confidence in whispers.

item.title: Trollbox Whisper
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
With all the anti-WKM proposals why not consider giving Fool and Scorned the ability to trollbox whispers? They have room for another day ability and it could indirectly counter WKM by reducing confidence in whispers.
